segments.text: Thank you for returning my call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted to have a talk with you about your son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was messing around last week in class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even though I asked him not to , he kept speaking out in class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know what his problem is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need you to talk to him , if you don't mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That won't happen again , I'm sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Hopefully I won't have to call about him again .
segments.speaker: S2
